title: Enhancing Leadership Competencies: Colloidal Stability and Aggregation Chemistry Using Local Cultural Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational college-level chemistry knowledge (atomic structure, chemical bonding, intermolecular interactions)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners explain colloidal dispersion stability mechanisms by linking them to regional food fermentation case studies
Learners diagnose colloidal aggregation issues in local industries (e.g., cosmetic emulsion instability) using chemical principles and propose solutions
Collecting/analyzing colloidal experiment data based on regional cultural resources via smartphone apps and compiling reports

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
